Burkina Faso - Financement Additionnel
            de Projet Sectoriel des Transporte : actualisation notice
            d'impact environnemental et social

trustfund:
TF050517-PHRD-BURKINA FASO: PREPARATION
            OF THE TRANSPORT SECTOR PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
This assessment of the Transport
            Sectoral Project of Burkina Faso has as its objectives to:
            identify and assess the impacts on the environment likely to
            be generated by the execution of the work of dirt roads and
            the exploitation of rehabilitated roads; propose and
            evaluate the extent necessary to prevent, limit, offset, or
            repair the negative impacts and maximize positive impacts
            associated with the work, conforming to the strategy within
            the framework of the Transport Sectoral Project. The various
            activities related to the work of rehabilitation of roads
            induce environment impacts on physical, biological and human
            phase of works (road construction) and after work (use of
            roads). Negative impacts of the project include: Impacts and
            measures related to soil; hydrology; vegetation, water,
            landscape, wildlife and flora; public health; traffic
            disruption for road users; and public security.
